TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeMapper extends System.Object

summary.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

span.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于高级 WPF 方案中，提供备用上下文和。 is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for and . 有关[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 应用程序，你应考虑重写此方案中，而不尝试使用。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding for this scenario, rather than attempting to use . 可以用于通过比的应用程序的更直接技术的自定义映射信息与提供 XAML 分析器上的程序集代码的值。 can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of values on the assembly code. 这可能很有用： 合并的程序集中的所有 CLR 命名空间; 二是引用类型包含 XAML 准备就绪，可以在现有程序集而无需重新编译它只是为了增加特性设置。This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add attributing. 通常创建实例，以指定属性值。You typically create a instance in order to specify the property value for a . 反过来可用作的上下文调用。The in turn can be used as the context for a call. ## 默认映射器Default Mapper 你可以获取默认映射程序使用静态属性。You can obtain a default mapper using the static property. 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如中指定构造函数) 使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以编程方式添加映射。 is a programmatic way to add a mapping. 例如，下面的 XAML 映射指令的不同部分对应的参数:For example, the different parts of the following XAML mapping instruction correspond to the parameters of the : ``` ... ``` `xmlNamespace`是`SDK`、`clrNamespace`是`Samples`，和`assemblyName`是`SDKSamples`。The `xmlNamespace` is `SDK`, the `clrNamespace` is `Samples`, and the `assemblyName` is `SDKSamples`.

returns.span: if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, .

span.span: if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有重写子类，始终返回`false`。If not overridden by a subclass, always returns `false`. 由子类中重写时, 的行为应不应返回`true`如果内部类型可以访问; 否则为`false`。When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper DefaultMapper { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper DefaultMapper
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultMapper As XamlTypeMapper
public: static property System::Windows::Markup::XamlTypeMapper ^ DefaultMapper { System::Windows::Markup::XamlTypeMapper ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.

span.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.
The default type mapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认映射器仅适用于默认程序集列表。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 有关程序集没有特定信息 (如中指定构造函数) 使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used. 在当前实现中的默认程序集列表是： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`. 使用默认映射器并不意味着，你根本无法使用自定义的程序集类型在 XAML 中使用。Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all. 它仅意味着如果你使用自定义类型/程序集，你必须再使用作为映射创建传统的 XAML 技术`xmlns`每个 XAML 页面，其中引用类型/程序集，而不是类型映射器 API 中的属性。It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

summary.span: Gets the CLR that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.

span.span: Gets the CLR that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.

returns.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

span.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法找到一种类型，映射到提供的信息，`null`返回。If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned. 不作为的一部分包括前缀`localName`。Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`. 对于任何前缀 XAML 元素的信息，将其分隔成`xmlNamespace`和`localName`此 API 调用的组件。For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
